front.title: •Haven
front.gametext: Deploy on one of the following systems: Rendezvous Point, Hoth, Yavin 4, Alderaan or Sullust. Your starships deploy -2 and your pilots deploy -1 here. When battling here, you may add one battle destiny. Effect canceled if opponent controls this system. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: After pursuit, asteroids, a slug, Jedi training, capture, torture, escape, a duel, losing Han and losing a hand, Luke and Leia finally made it to the Alliance's rendezvous point.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Haven + Echo Base Operations Force the Dark Side fleet into a confrontation.
Haven + Rebel Planners + General Dodonna A huge and inexpensive power total at the home system.
